amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 17 and printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 300 (Roll no. 287).
